message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. This is a great deal, considering the product's value is worth no less than $10000 to me.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I'm willing to make a reasonable offer, but I have to consider my budget. Can you meet me at $10000?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $11500. This is a fair compromise, considering the product's value to me is no less than $10000.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $10500 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10500. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer you the product for $11200. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a fair price considering the product's value to me.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $11200 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $10800 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?

I understand that $10800 is still a bit above your budget, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll meet you halfway between $10800 and my original price of $12000. I'll offer you the product for $11400. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I hope you'll consider it.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $11400 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $10500 for the product. This is my final offer, and I hope you'll consider it.
